snippet.title: HITMAN 3: Seven Deadly Sins - Act 7: Wrath (Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
They're coming for you... Prepare for the final act of the Seven Deadly Sins - and go deep into the mind of an angry Agent 47!

The Season of Wrath takes you back to Dartmoor, where you’ll need to plan, adapt and survive against an onslaught of enemies. Take them all down to unlock firepower of your own and unleash your wrath. Failure is not an option. Complete all three stages of the new Wrath Termination Escalation and unlock new sin-themed suit and items.
